title: cf.tls\_client\_auth.cert\_issuer\_dn\_legacy
content:
`cf.tls_client_auth.cert_issuer_dn_legacy` String

The Distinguished Name (DN) of the Certificate Authority (CA) that issued the certificate in the request in a legacy format.

This field is only filled in if the request includes a client certificate for [mTLS authentication](https://developers.cloudflare.com/ssl/client-certificates/enable-mtls/).
